doc.field: Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Communist Party of the United States of America Records

This subseries consists of over 300 posters dating from the 1930s to the present, with the bulk dating from the 1970s to the present. The subseries documents a diverse array of topics of interest to the international Communist movement, including domestic and international political issues, Communist history, labor organizing, and solidarity movements. There are a significant number of posters produced by the CPUSA, the Communist Party of Portugal, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the French Communist Party and the General Confederation of Labour (CGT), as well as posters created by a range of organizations and individuals. There are a significant number of posters produced for the annual World Youth and Students Festival. The posters in this subseries include a diverse array of graphic styles and production techniques. These posters place the CPUSA within the context of worldwide Communist organizing, and are particularly strong on international political issues.
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
